column1: hyadamsfoster 160233608067 "2017-05-02 17:15:29 GMT" https://hyadamsfoster.tumblr.com/post/160233608067/the-fosters-timeline "adamsfoster-mamas: Canon Things First Stef born April 14th
column3: 1975 - S2E1 Turned 40 on screen - S4E5Jude born November 11
column4: 2000 - S2E1 Turned 13 on screen - S1E16Callie born July 11
column5: 1997 - S3E4 Twins are 16 - S3E17 Brandon is 18 - S3E20 Brandon was around 5 when Stef & Lena met - S1E9 Brandon was 5 when Stef & Mike got divorced - S1E3 Twins were 5 when Stef & Lena first fostered them - S1E8 Lena was 26 when she met Stef - S3E18 Would put Stef around 29/30 based on age differenceStef & Lena were together for 10 years - S1E1 Stef & Lena celebrated 1 year wedding anniversary (together for 11yrs) - S4E4 Now Onto Guesses and Headcanons Pilot took place late 2013/early 2014 Show is now taking place in 2015 (which makes some other shit possible)¬† Brandon born 1997 (makes him 18) Callie almost 18 (born 1997) Twins born 1998/1999 (makes them 16) Jude almost 15 (born 2000) Stef almost 43 (born 1972) Stef & Lena get together late 2003/early 2004 - together for a total of 11 years Twins were first fostered 2003/2004 (based on assumed birth year and the fact that Stef & Lena first got them when they were 5)¬† Headcanon - It took 3 years to finalize the twins adoption so they were 8 (2006/2007) when they became FostersYou have to stretch some things to make a timeline work for this show
column6: like how old Stef & Lena were when they got together. And you also notice how fast things must have happened for other portions of the timeline to work
column7: like them fostering and adopting the twins
column9: etc.¬† Special thanks to @UKEndeavour (UKEndeavour) for allowing me to use some of her info and for allowing me to post this in the first place! I didn‚Äôt want to step on anyone‚Äôs toes.¬† " False text
